div.div: Temporal trends in glacier length, surface ablation and runoff.
div.p: Marine-terminating glacier length changes (percentage per year) by time interval for ( A) QEI and ( B) BBI. Trends in mean runoff (millimeter w.e. year –1) and mean ablation area (as the percentage of glacier basin area) calculated from RACMO2.3 statistically downscaled to 1 km for ( C) QEI and ( D) BBI. Surge-type glaciers are excluded. Thick horizontal lines are mean values, and outer horizontal lines are ±1 SE.
